message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm starting us off with a generous offer.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's try something more reasonable.  This offer considers the time value of money for both of us.
Don't get greedy, Bob. This is my final offer.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any further delay just hurts both of us.
